text:
@NYGovCuomo Coronavirus and the Sun: a Lesson from the 1918 Influenza Pandemic
https://t.co/fFdlkfKvtq

Would any of these alternative methods help kill the virus?

Sun rays
Hospital rooms with UV lights
Higher temperature 
Higher humidity
Alkaline body
Respirator with a slight vacuum?
